# netbox_module (Data Source)

Retrieves information about a module in NetBox. Modules are hardware components installed in module bays within devices.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Example 1: Lookup by ID
data "netbox_module" "by_id" {
  id = "1"
}

# Example 2: Lookup by device_id and module_bay_id
data "netbox_module" "by_device_and_bay" {
  device_id     = "5"
  module_bay_id = "10"
}

# Example 3: Lookup by device_id and serial
data "netbox_module" "by_device_and_serial" {
  device_id = "5"
  serial    = "SN123456"
}

# Use module data in other resources
output "module_serial" {
  value = data.netbox_module.by_id.serial
}

output "module_status" {
  value = data.netbox_module.by_device_and_bay.status
}

output "module_type" {
  value = data.netbox_module.by_id.module_type
}

output "module_device" {
  value = data.netbox_module.by_id.device
}

# Access all custom fields
output "module_custom_fields" {
  value       = data.netbox_module.by_id.custom_fields
  description = "All custom fields defined in NetBox for this module"
}

# Access specific custom fields by name
output "module_firmware_version" {
  value       = try([for cf in data.netbox_module.by_id.custom_fields : cf.value if cf.name == "firmware_version"][0], null)
  description = "Example: accessing a text custom field"
}

output "module_install_date" {
  value       = try([for cf in data.netbox_module.by_id.custom_fields : cf.value if cf.name == "install_date"][0], null)
  description = "Example: accessing a date custom field"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device_id` (Number) The numeric ID of the device. Used with serial or module_bay_id for lookup when ID is not provided.
- `id` (Number) The unique numeric ID of the module.
- `module_bay_id` (Number) The numeric ID of the module bay. Used with device_id for lookup when ID is not provided.
- `serial` (String) Serial number of the module. Can be used for lookup with device_id.

### Read-Only

- `asset_tag` (String) A unique tag used to identify this module.
- `comments` (String) Additional comments or notes.
- `custom_fields` (Set of Object) Custom fields associated with this module. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--custom_fields))
- `description` (String) A description of the module.
- `device` (String) The name of the device.
- `display_name` (String) The display name of the module.
- `module_bay` (String) The name of the module bay.
- `module_type` (String) The model name of the module type.
- `module_type_id` (Number) The numeric ID of the module type.
- `status` (String) Operational status.

<a id="nestedatt--custom_fields"></a>
### Nested Schema for `custom_fields`

Read-Only:

- `name` (String)
- `type` (String)
- `value` (String)
